channel.title: How do i keep my server up longer?
channel.description: my server works fine but give it like 10 - 20 mins and it will say error connecting for other players so i have to close a reopen my compile causing the people that are already on it 2 have 2 relogin i would like to just open the server and leave it running for hours not having to keep reseting it over and over can any1 help me out?
